actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to sales of defense articles and services to Egypt.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that if the United States sells C-130 aircraft to Egypt, in accordance with the statement submitted pursuant to transmittal number 76-47, no additional sales of defense articles or defense services should be made to Egypt until the President certifies to the Congress that Egypt has stated that a state of war no longer exists between it and Israel and has renounced the use of war against Israel except in its military self defense.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to sales of defense articles and services to Egypt.
